posts.title: Question about Difficulty of Class CS330
posts.body: Hello, my name is Joe and I am a rising junior planning to take CS 330 next semester. In context, I struggled with CS 112 and CS 131, and I was wondering if anyone could share experiences with CS 330 and its difficulty compared to previous courses. Thanks!

comments.comment: CS330 is the the hardest cs class i took.
CS330 wasn't that bad.
CS330 was awful

posts.title: Clarifying time complexity of this algorithm

comments.comment: Should be O(n)
Check lecture 7 slide 78
I think it's O(n) because we are traversing through each element at most once.

posts.title: BFS vs DFS
posts.body: When should I use BFS over DFS in graph problems?

comments.comment: Use BFS to find shortest path
BFS searches adjacent nodes, so it will find the shortest path quicker, since we will run out of nodes to add to the queue sooner for that path.
DFS is better for decision based problems and is quicker than BFS, since it doesn't search all neighbors.

posts.title: Stack vs Queue
posts.body: How do I decide when to use a stack vs queue?

comments.comment: Use BFS to find shortest path
BFS searches adjacent nodes, so it will find the shortest path quicker, since we will run out of nodes to add to the queue sooner for that path.
DFS is better for decision based problems and is quicker than BFS, since it doesn't search all neighbors.

posts.title: Stack vs Queue
posts.body: How do I decide when to use a stack vs queue?

comments.comment: stack is fifo
queue is lifo
stack and queue are implemented the same way in python

courses.course: Business, Ethics, and the Creation of Value

posts.title: Midterm 1 Topics
posts.body: What topics will be convered in the Midterm 1 exam?

comments.comment: Everything until Lecture 13
Focus on goods, services, labor, and capital concepts.

posts.title: Midterm 2 Topics
posts.body: What topics will be convered in the Midterm 2 exam?

comments.comment: Slide 78 on lecture 20
I would focus on types of markets.

posts.title: Midterm 1 Topics
posts.body: What topics will be convered in the Midterm 1 exam?

comments.comment: Everything until Lecture 15
Focus on cash flow streams and formulas.

posts.title: Midterm 2 Topics
posts.body: What topics will be convered in the Midterm 2 exam?

comments.comment: Last slide on lecture 50
I would focus on stock and bond valuation.
